DataListSpec.Name: Sponsorship Opportunity Eligibility Process Data List
DataListSpec.Description: List of saved sponsorship opportunity eligibility processes
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS as begin
set nocount on;
select so_eligibilityprocess.ID, so_eligibilityprocess.NAME, so_eligibilityprocess.DESCRIPTION, idset.NAME as SELECTIONNAME, case when addedbyca.ID is null then '' else addedbyca.USERNAME end as ADDEDBY, so_eligibilityprocess.DATEADDED, case when changedbyca.ID is null then '' else changedbyca.USERNAME end as CHANGEDBY, so_eligibilityprocess.DATECHANGED
from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITYPROCESS so_eligibilityprocess
inner join dbo.IDSETREGISTER as idset on so_eligibilityprocess.IDSETREGISTERID = idset.ID
left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT addedbyca on so_eligibilityprocess.ADDEDBYID = addedbyca.ID
left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT changedbyca on so_eligibilityprocess.ADDEDBYID = changedbyca.ID
end
